parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.00 </value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> DLC </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns DLC information about given object or model.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getAssetDLCInfo]] asset </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> asset: [[Object]] or [[String]] - object reference or path to the model </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - array in format: [isDlc, isOwned, isInstalled, isAvailable, appID, DLCName], where:
* isDlc: [[Boolean]] - the asset belongs to a DLC
* isOwned: [[Boolean]] 
* isInstalled: [[Boolean]] 
* isAvailable: [[Boolean]] 
* appID: [[String]] - actual steam item ID or "0" for none or "-1" for unknown 
* DLCName: [[String]] - actual DLC name or "" </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[getAssetDLCInfo]] [class, config] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [class, config]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - class name of the asset  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> config (Optional): [[Config]] - config to search in, default: <tt>[[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles"</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - array in format: [isDlc, isOwned, isInstalled, isAvailable, appID, DLCName], where:
* isDlc: [[Boolean]] - the asset belongs to a DLC
* isOwned: [[Boolean]] 
* isInstalled: [[Boolean]] 
* isAvailable: [[Boolean]] 
* appID: [[String]] - actual steam item ID or "0" for none or "-1" for unknown 
* DLCName: [[String]] - actual DLC name or "" </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] "a3\Weapons_F_Enoch\Rifles\MSBS\MSBS65_F";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] ["C_Van_01_transport_F"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] ["arifle_AK12_F", [[configFile]] >> "CfgWeapons"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________


</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDLCs]], [[getObjectDLC]], [[getPersonUsedDLCs]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getDLCAssetsUsage]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
